intro.title: Comprehensive Debtor Analysis
intro.description: Screening is a comprehensive verification of an individual or company in all available registries and databases. This gives you a complete picture of a potential tenant, business partner, or employee.
intro.subtitle: Why is screening important?
intro.paragraph1: Are you renting out property or entering into a business partnership? Don't know who you're entrusting your property to or who you're contracting with? Screening provides you with key information that will help you make an informed decision and prevent potential problems.
intro.paragraph2: Our comprehensive screening includes verification in the land registry, insolvency registry, central enforcement registry, and other registries. This gives you a complete overview of the financial situation and credibility of the screened person or company.

faq.title: Answers to Your Questions
faq.description: Here you will find answers to the most common questions about our screening service.

items.question: How long does screening processing take?
items.answer: Standard processing time is within 24 hours on working days. In case of urgent need, contact us and we will try to speed up the process.

items.question: What information do I need to order screening?
items.answer: For screening an individual, we need name, surname, and date of birth. For screening a company, the company ID is sufficient. The more information you provide, the more accurate results we can deliver.

items.question: Is screening legal?
items.answer: Yes, our screening is conducted only on the basis of publicly available information and registries in accordance with applicable legislation and GDPR.

items.question: How will I receive the screening results?
items.answer: We will send the screening results to your email in the form of a clear report in PDF format. The report contains all the information found and expert commentary on the results.

items.question: Can I use screening for employment purposes?
items.answer: Screening is primarily intended for verifying credibility in property rental and business relationships. For employment purposes, we recommend consulting with a lawyer about what information you can use in this context in accordance with employment law.

items.question: What if I need screening for multiple individuals or companies?
items.answer: If you are interested in screening multiple individuals or companies, contact us at info@expohledavky.cz. We will be happy to prepare an individual offer with a volume discount.
